There were 12 other sightings in Middletown on or around May 20th 2012
divs: sighting detailstonight, my family and i was standing outside looking at the stars, when all the sudden, this huge ball of light was heading straight toward us. coming from the south\west. it was very low in the sky. it got close, then changed directions, but before it change direction, it went dark, then started blinking like crazy. heading north\west. it gave me the chills
